description:
As a user of Shopline
  I want to check the promotion would be applied
  When it reach the minimum items limit
name: All kind of over minimum items promotion with bundle group promotion - disount amount

elements.name: buy 11 items for check over Minimum amounts Promotion and Bundle Group Pricing Promotion should be applied correctly

steps.name: I am on Admin Login Page
I fill correct account email to email field
I fill correct account password to password field
I click on login button
I should see successful login
I check intercom message notification frame and click clear intercom message button
I check intercom message notification frame and click intercom message close button
I check new feature alert notification frame and click new feature alert close button
I check and click no thanks button
I am on Shop Login Page
I fill email to email field
I fill password to password field
I click on submit button
I should be redirected to Shop Home Page
I am on Shop Product Index Page
I input 'A Product for Checkout' to search field
1st product of products list should contain 'A Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"A Product for CheckoutNT$35","expectText":"A Product for Checkout"}

I should be redirected to Shop Product Show Page
I click on addon item checkbox
I click on buy together button
I am on Shop Product Index Page
I input 'B Product for Checkout' to search field
1st product of products list should contain 'B Product for Checkout'

I should see addon added to cart
I select language dropdown option included 'English' of language dropdown
I wait for 3 seconds for loading
language dropdown should contain 'English'
I select country dropdown option included 'Taiwan' of country list dropdown
I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I select delivery dropdown option included 'Custom Delivery' of delivery method dropdown
